lead_paragraph: The Giants signed defensive end Renaldo Wynn, an 11-year veteran who played for New Orleans last season. He was a first-round draft choice, 21st over all, out of Notre Dame in 1997 by Jacksonville, when Tom Coughlin was the coach of the Jaguars. He has 25 sacks in 164 career games.
